name: White Nights
description:
A visual novel version of Dostoyevsky's short story, this is an account of a "dreamer" who takes walks during St. Petersburg's "white nights", and his encounter with a distressed stranger.

  • writer: Fyodor Mikhailovich Dostoyevsky
  • character art: Rio
  • BGs: Kathryn
  • producer & director: mikey
